messages.subject: Asthma and homeopathy
messages.msgSnippet: Because of lack of time I skip over a lot of posts on the digest. I noticed lately that there has been a lot of talk about children and croup and asthma. I
messages.messageBody:
Because of lack of time I skip over a lot of posts on the digest. I noticed lately that there has been a lot of talk about children and croup and asthma.

I just wanted to mention that homeopathy, under the care of a real homeopath, can work wonders for asthma and allergies. We've used homeopathy for years for other things and I've run into many peolpe who say it's been a godsend.

Susan
